scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:unit: export NODE_ENV=test || SET NODE_ENV=test && mocha --opts test/unit/mocha.opts test/unit/**/*.js
scripts.test:integration: export NODE_ENV=test || SET NODE_ENV=test && mocha --opts test/integration/mocha.opts test/integration/**/*.js
scripts.dev: export NODE_ENV=development || SET NODE_ENV=development && nodemon --exec 'npm start'
